attributes.action: Bring in a possible alternate verdict of Not proven.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Not proven would be a verdict given in Court which would establishe that the prosecution have not provided enough substantial proof to convict the individual of a crime, but that there remains considerable doubt regarding the offender's innocence. This would mean that in a case where the jury think the crime may well have been commited but dont have enough evidence to bring a guilty verdict they could bring back a verdict of not proven which would leave the possibility of a retrial if more evidence came to light in the future.
